caption: Observation
description: A record of an observed value or event that captures the timing and frequency of its occurrence. Used to track when values/events were first detected, last detected, and their total occurrence count.
name: observation

value.description: The specific value, event, indicator or data point that was observed and recorded. This is the core piece of information being tracked.

count.description: Integer representing the total number of times this specific value/event was observed across all occurrences. Helps establish prevalence and patterns.

first_seen_time.description: The timestamp indicating when this value. was initially observed. Important for establishing the start of the observation period.

last_seen_time.description: The timestamp marking the most recent observation of this value. Together with first_seen_time defines the full observation timespan.
